reviews.review: I expected a great movie. And I watched the best movie ever! Blew me away! I laughed, I cried. I sat in my car afterwards and contemplated life. Go. Watch. This. Movie.
Where to begin? I won’t other than just say I’d give it 6 stars if I could. So fulfilling and satisfying the 10 year investment is paid off even though there’s a part 2 yet to be made.
If you liked Civil War and the previous Avengers films, you'll enjoy this one.

It's The best mcu movie, The best superhero movie with the best best superhero villian ever.
Josh Brolin is incredibly spectacular as Thanos The Mad Titan.
The story awesome and the New characters too.

This movie sucked badly! Save your money! The 26 different plot lines never connect, the characters fail to meet any of their previous performances and the ending is so vague and unsatisfying it made me want my money back. This has completely turned me off to the rest of the Marvel Studios movies. Don't bother with this even if it's just streaming at 99¢
It was really good. Would've been really GREAT if I knew more about the Guardians of the Galaxy and Dr. Strange prior to seeing the movie.

my opionin on this movie is so...There were so many parts in this movie were ppl should have died that didn't and that sucked D.C never held anything back they killed superman without blinking.Things in this movie they did let a bad taste in my mouth i never understood why they need a reason to bring in the Guardians of the Galaxy into this movie it just doesnt make sence to me. Tantos was boring thor should have die at start and Tony should have died too
What this film has done is unprecedented, Thanos is by far the best part of this movie.

Thank you Kevin Fiege, Russo Bro's, awesome cast and everyone involved in the movie. Movie may be running for 2 and half hours, but the screenplay is so awesome that you'll feel like the movie is going fast. It's worth a long wait.  Worth for IMAX. Don't miss this out. Thank you Marvel Studios for giving us the awesome entertainment from the past 10 years and I'm sure you'll keep entertaining us in the future. Waiting for next year Avengers!!!
